Hortavie Mpondo (a mụrụ na 27 June 1992) bụ onye Cameroon na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nlereanya, na onye na-eme ọchị.
A mụrụ Mpongo na Limbe, Cameroon n'afọ 1992
Ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na College Sonara
N'afọ 2010, Mpongo kwagara Douala iji mụọ biochemistry na Mahadum Douala Nne na nna ya akwadoghị nhọrọ ọrụ ya na ime ihe nkiri, na-ekwere na ndị na-ese ihe bụ ndị na-amaghị akwụkwọ.
Mpondo malitere ọrụ ya dịka ihe nlereanya, ọ bụkwa ihu maka akara BoldMakeUp
O guzobekwara maka BGFIBank Group na Cameroon

Ruo oge ụfọdụ, ụlọ ọrụ Niki Heat Model Management nọchitere anya ya. N'afọ 2017, ọ nọchitere anya akara Deidoboy n'oge Deidoboay Fashion Day na Alfred Saker College na mpaghara Deïdo na Douala n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri telivishọn Cameroon President Tchop Tchop.
N'afọ 2017, ọ tụgharịrị uche ya na ime ihe nkiri

N'afọ ahụ, Mpongo pụtara dịka Amanda, nwanne nwanyị Cynthia Elizabeth na Le Coeur d'Adzaï, nke Stéphane Jung na Sergio Marcello duziri. O gosipụtara Samira, nwa nwanyị nke okenye nke onye isi mmegbu, na ihe nkiri mkpirikpi nke Therry Kamdem bụ Elles n'afọ 2018. N'afọ 2019, ọ mere Morelia na ihe nkiri Dante Fox dị mkpirikpi The Solo Girl O kwuru na nke a bụ ọrụ kachasị sie ike n'ọrụ ya, ọ malitekwara ịkwagharị maka ya. Mpondo bụ onye isi na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Coup de foudre à Yaoundé, nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri kpuru ìsì bụ Mason Ewing duziri.
Na mgbakwunye na ime ihe nkiri na ime ihe ngosi, Mpondo na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye na-ese ihe osise
